憱字的基本解释

憱
cù
忧伤，脸色改色：“及狱决罪定，公憱然不悦，形于颜色。”

憱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cù］
［《玉篇》初又切］
通“愀1”。
变色改容。

憱字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憱； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页404第06
【五音集韻】初救切，音簉。【集韻】慼也。　又【字彙補】與蹙同。【戰國策】汗明憱焉。【註】憱蹙同。

憱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
憱字的起名意思

暂无。

Squat
Basic explanation of words
Squat
cù
Sad, his complexion changed: "As soon as the prison is convicted, the public is unhappy, which is in the form of color."
Squat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cù］
["Jade Pian" is cut again at the beginning]
Linked with "愀1".
Change color and volume.
Squat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 404 06
【Pentagram Rhyme】First rescue cut, sound 簉. [Ji Yun] Qi Ye.　[Word Supplement] Same as 蹙. 【Warring States Policy】Khan Ming Yan Yan. [Note] The same floppy.
